A multi-layered security system that uses artificial intelligence to detect and prevent cyber attacks in real-time.
A virtual private network (VPN) that encrypts all data transmitted over the internet and masks user IP addresses to protect against hacking attempts.
A biometric authentication system that uses facial recognition or fingerprint scanning to verify users' identities before granting access to sensitive systems.
A comprehensive incident response plan that outlines procedures for responding to and mitigating cyber attacks.
A regular training program for employees on how to recognize and respond to common cyber threats, such as phishing scams and malware attacks.
